description: I was working on the cutting edge invoice and billing app from the fintech industry and creating beautiful UI for the app and clients to use it and simplify creating and tracking of their invoices. The technology I'm using are JavaScript, HTML & SCSS, VueJS 3, Vuex, ChartJS, PrimeVue, PrimeVueFlex, GIT, Trello ect.

I was creating a TrendSeam e-commerce Shopify app for TSD company that analyzes data from Shopify stores and represents data in a visually compelling view. The technologies I was using are JavaScript, Shopify App, Remix, Polaris UI, ChartJS, HTML & SCSS, Fly.io, GIT, JIRA ect.

As freelance frontend developer I'm working remotely on various web applications and websites. The technology I was using are JavaScript, HTML & SCSS, VueJS 3, Pinia, NuxtJS 3, Node, PHP, GIT, JIRA ect.

I was working remotely as frontend developer on the project for company websites and web app from Figma designs to finished product. Technology that I was using are JavaScript, HTML & SCSS, NuxtJS 3, NuxtJS Modules, Figma, GIT, JIRA ect.

As freelance frontend developer I was working remotely on various web applications and websites. Technology that I was using are JavaScript, HTML & SCSS, VueJS 3, Pinia, NuxtJS 3, Node, PHP, GIT, JIRA ect.

I was working remotely as frontend developer on the enterprise web application for IoT industry. The Internet of Things is already fundamentally changing our world and our lives. Technology that I was using are JavaScript, HTML & SCSS, VueJS, Vuex, Vuetify, GIT, JIRA ect.

I was working remotely as a freelance frontend developer for Examiz company. As a frontend developer I was working on the enterprise app solution for HR managers inside big companies. Technology that I was using are VueJS, Vuex, JavaScript, HTML & SCSS, BootstrapVue, GIT, JIRA ect.

I was working remotely as a web developer for Spanish company specialize in E-commerce solutions. I was creating E-commerce websites for clients, installing modules, and also maintaining and upgrading others clients' shops. Technology that I was using are PHP & MySQL, JS, HTML & CSS, PrestaShop, GIT ect.

I was working remotely as a full stack web developer for company specialize in moving. My responsibility is to develop, maintain and upgrade company’s website. Technology that I’m using are PHP & Silex framework, JS, HTML & CSS, SCSS, GIT ect.

I worked on the frontend part of the B2B application for Germany dairy industry. And one of my responsibility was to develop and maintain company's website. Main technology which I used was JS and VueJS, HTML & CSS, PHP & Laravel, GIT.
I worked as full stack web developer on various web projects. Main technology which I used was PHP & MySql, JS and VueJS, HTML & CSS, GIT, Pug, SASS, Firebase ect.
I worked as a lecturer at the initial course of web development where I taught students to the basics of HTML and CSS technology.
I worked as a lecturer at the initial course of web development where I taught students to the basics of HTML and CSS technology.

I worked on the frontend part of the betting and gambling apps for casinos and bookmaker. Also I was in contact with programmers from partner's company and with our clients from casinos and betting house. And one of my responsibility was to develop and maintain company's website. Main technology which I used was JS and AngularJS, HTML & CSS, GIT.

I worked on the web pages and web apps for clients. I also maintained legacy code. In addition, I worked in a team of developers and the main technologies that I used were PHP & Laravel framework, HTML & CSS, and also JavaScript.

I have successfully completed the program OGO Sense practices in the field of IT support and maintenance with focus on Client training and communication, Joomla CMS website management and CentOS administration.

In this practice, I worked with MSSQL databases, I was introduced to the basics of Delphi programming language and creating a form for entering and collecting data from the database via the Delphi. Also, I was introduced to the design of the database via MSSQL, installing Windows and Linux OS systems and MSSQL Server installation. I also worked in Embarcadero Framework.
